meanings.definition: The skin at the base of a fingernail or toenail.
meanings.sent1: I carefully pushed back my cuticles to keep my nails healthy.
meanings.sent2: Her manicurist trimmed her cuticles during the nail treatment.
meanings.sent3: The cuticles on my fingers seemed to have a mind of their own, growing faster than I could trim them.
meanings.sent4: Her cuticles were like tiny guardians protecting the delicate nail beds.
meanings.sent5: The cuticles, like little gates, shielded the nails from harm.
